mapper.select: select * from orders WHERE o_status IN('조리중', '취소') ORDER BY o_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( o_idx, o_number, o_total_amount, o_status, o_is_takeout, user_id , o_coupon_sale ) VALUES ( #{o_idx}, #{o_number}, #{o_total_amount}, #{o_status}, #{o_is_takeout}, #{user_id}, #{o_coupon_sale} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM orders where substring(o_number,1,4) = date_format(now(),"%y%m") AND o_status IN ('처리완료','취소')) od inner join order_items oi on od.o_number = oi.oi_id
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM orders where substring(o_number,1,6) = date_format(now(),"%y%m%d") AND o_status IN ('처리완료','취소')) od inner join order_items oi on od.o_number = oi.oi_id
